conversationStarted.name: Conversation Started
conversationStarted.description: Track when a user initiates a conversation with the chatbot
conversationStarted.trigger: User sends first message or clicks start conversation
conversationStarted.code: window.plausible('Conversation Started', { props: { conversationType, userType, entryPoint } })

conversationCompleted.name: Conversation Completed
conversationCompleted.description: Track when a conversation is successfully completed
conversationCompleted.trigger: User receives final response or closes conversation successfully
conversationCompleted.code: window.plausible('Conversation Completed', { props: { messageCount, duration, outcome, category } })
